name: JoinFour
0:
”Alexa open Join Four”
”Alexa play Join Four”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: join four
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Puzzle Games.

In this classic game, join four tiles in a row to win. You can play this game using your voice by saying numbers 1 to 7. You can also tap the column number that you would like to place the tile. There are 3 difficulties. Easy, Medium and Hard.

This skill is only supports on Echo Show and Fire TV Devices

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Puzzle Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
